channel.title: Provincia Milano on Blanka's Travel Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Provincia Milano on Blanka's Travel Blog

item.title: Milano
item.description: Milano. If you tell anyone that you are in Milano, the general reaction is “ooo, how lucky you are what a beautiful city!

item.title: The Milano agglomeration
item.description: The unimaginable happened. We left our lovely Piemonte and crossed the magical line this ending up in Lombardy.

item.title: The Torino-Milano line
item.description: When arriving to the train station of Chivasso one would reconsider staying on the train and not getting out…
